newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh taka ends flat against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh taka ends flat against dollar.

text.p: The Bangladesh taka finished flat at 43.7495/7500 to the dollar in interbank trading on Tuesday, dealers said.
The local unit was quoted in a wide spread of 43.7470/7550 per dollar in early trade but deals mostly centred at around 43.7500.
Dealers said there were very few transactions with most dollar selling banks remaining unresponsive to demands for their own import requirements.
Interbank call money rates closed softer at 6.5-7.5 percent against the previous seven to nine percent, dealers said.
